mapper.select: select p.prodid , p.prodname , s.memid , p.prodcateid , c.prodcatename , p.prodimage , p.prodprice , p.prodprice * 0.7 as kidsprice , p.prodstock , to_char(p.prodinputdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodinputdate , to_char(p.prodstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodstartdate , to_char(p.prodenddate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodenddate , p.prodcontent , m.memaddr || ' ' || p.prodplace as memplace , p.prodplace from products p , prodcategory c , selllist s , members m where p.prodcateid = c.prodcateid and s.prodid = p.prodid and m.memid = s.memid and p.prodid = #{prodid} order by prodinputdate

select rownum, a.* from ( select p.prodid , p.prodname , p.prodcateid , c.prodcatename , p.prodimage , p.prodprice , p.prodstock , to_char(p.prodinputdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodinputdate , to_char(p.prodstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodstartdate , to_char(p.prodenddate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodenddate , p.prodcontent , p.prodplace from products p , prodcategory c where p.prodcateid = c.prodcateid order by p.prodinputdate desc, p.prodid desc) a where prodenddate >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
and lower(prodname) like lower(#{keyword})
and lower(prodcontent) like #{keyword}
and lower(prodname || prodcontent) like lower(#{keyword})

select count(*) as cnt from products
where lower(prodname) like lower(#{keyword})
where lower(prodcontent) like #{keyword}
where lower(prodname || prodcontent) like lower(#{keyword})

select p.prodid , s.memid , p.prodname , p.prodcateid , c.prodcatename , p.prodimage , p.prodprice , p.prodstock , to_char(p.prodinputdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodinputdate , to_char(p.prodstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodstartdate , to_char(p.prodenddate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as prodenddate , p.prodcontent , m.memaddr || ' ' || p.prodplace as memplace from selllist s , products p , prodcategory c , members m where s.memid=#{memid} and s.prodid = p.prodid and p.prodcateid=c.prodcateid and m.memid = s.memid
and lower(prodname) like lower(#{keyword})
and lower(prodcontent) like #{keyword}
and lower(prodname || prodcontent) like lower(#{keyword})
